reviews.content: As a result of my long researches, I am happy to have met my teacher, Deniz Yƒ±lmaz. I definitely owe it to him that I overcame my dentist phobia from my childhood. I felt comfortable with his smiling face and warm-blooded demeanor, thank you Deniz, teacher üôè‚ò∫Ô∏è

reviews.content: He is a very beautiful person not only with the quality of his work but also with his smiling.
reviews.author: Emrecan

reviews.content: I can say she is the best dentist is Istanbul. I recommend her to everyone.
reviews.author: Aslƒ±

reviews.content: Thanks to Dr. Deniz, my teeth became like pearls. His clinic is so beautiful and every detail is peaceful. You complete your treatment in a safe environment in an incredibly comfortable way. I recommend it to anyone who has problems with their teeth.
reviews.author: Ebrar
